changeSet.sql: -- migrate raw records INSERT INTO ${database.defaultSchemaName}.raw_records_lb SELECT r.id AS id, -- rr.id AS id, -- rr.jsonb->>'id' AS id, rr.jsonb->>'content' AS content -- rr.creation_date AS creationDate, -- rr.created_by AS createdBy FROM ${database.defaultSchemaName}.records r INNER JOIN ${database.defaultSchemaName}.raw_records rr ON r.jsonb->>'rawRecordId' = rr.jsonb->>'id';
